basic_info.name: IIMT & School of Law Scholarships
description: Ideal Institute of Management and Technology provides scholarships for the meritorious students of the institute. One of the students under the “National Scholarship Scheme” got a scholarship amount of INR 24000 during the course of study. Adding to this, another student under the “Merit Scholarship for Minority” got a scholarship amount of INR 8000.

In the year 2023, around 12 students benefitted through the scholarship scheme “E-District Portal for SC/ST/OBC category”. A whopping amount of INR 11,21,960 was given as a scholarship to eligible students. Under the “E-District Portal” scholarship scheme, two students got more than INR 1 lac each as the scholarship amount in the current year.

faqs.question: Ques. What are the facilities offered by IIMT, New Delhi?
faqs.answer: Ans.IIMT New Delhi provides adequate facilities such as Moot Court, Lecture Rooms, Computer Lab, Library, Auditorium, Seminar Hall, IQAC Rooms, Common Rooms, Conference Room & a lot more.Check:IIMT New Delhi Reviews

faqs.question: Ques. Does IIMT, New Delhi provide any internship program?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, IIMT New Delhi provides 100% Internship openings to the students. The cell facilitates the process by providing the leads and information to the students and organizing On-campus Placement Drives, Off-campus Placement Interviews, Job Fairs, and Central Placements organized through GGSIP University.

faqs.question: Who are the top recruiter companies of IIMT, New Delhi?
faqs.answer: Ans.The top recruiters of IIMT, New Delhi are top MNCs such as Amazon, Air India, RBS, NIIT, ICICI Bank, Nestkeys, Axis Bank, Max Life, Excide Life Insurance, Get Zo & several other giant firms.Check:IIMT Placement

faqs.question: Ques. Does IIMT encourage students to take a part in other activities?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, IIMT New Delhi has several Societies/Clubs/Associations to practice, propagate promote personal and professional development. These Societies have open membership, that can be joined in the first year itself. Societies like Ideal Law Society, Ideal Dramatic Society, Ideal Photography Club, Ideal Talent Club & several others.

faqs.question: Ques. Does IITMT provide admission through Management Quota?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes. IIMT provides 10% of the intake seat for the admission of the desired course through Management Quota. Students must perform well in CLAT/CET to be selected.

faqs.question: What is the application procedure at IIMT, Delhi?
faqs.answer: Ans.Candidates can follow the GGS IP University, Delhi procedure.

faqs.question: Does IIMT, Delhi provide hostel facilities?
faqs.answer: Ans.No, Ideal Institute of Management and Technology & School of Law does not provide hostel facilities to the students.

faqs.question: Can one take admission in the IIMT, Delhi without an entrance exam?
faqs.answer: Ans.Candidates have to appear for CET/CLAT entrance exam for admission in the Ideal Institute of Management and Technology & School of Law. There is no provision for direct admission in the institute.

faqs.question: How much salary one can get on completion of BA LLB (Integrated) course from IIMT, Delhi?
faqs.answer: Ans.Students can easily get an average annual package of INR 3.5 LPA after completing BA LLB (Integrated) program from Ideal Institute of Management and Technology & School of Law.

Section.name: About IIMT
Section.description:
Ideal Institute of Management and Technology & School of Law (IIMT), established in 1999 is affiliated to Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University, approved by BCI and AICTE. The Institute is accredited by NAAC. The institute offers undergraduate courses in the discipline of Management, IT and Law.
Admission in the IIMT is done on the basis of the performance of the candidates in the national and state level entrance exam. The institute has a dedicated Training and Placement Cell which provides 100% placement assistance to its students. Some of the top recruiters are British Council, Centrum Capital, Startek, iEnergiser, Axis bank, The Royal Bank of Scotland, Saint Gobain, Air India, Park Hotel, Cognizione, Sharekhan, Max Life Insurance, nestkeys etc.
Check: IIMT & School of Law Admission
